New Records: Glenn Maxwell scored the fastest ever hundred at the Cricket World Cup in 40 balls
Glenn Maxwell's hundred was the fourth-fastest ODI hundred
Key Match Events: Glenn Maxwell scored 106 runs off 44 balls
David Warner scored 104 runs off 93 balls
Adam Zampa picked four wickets for eight runs in three overs
Miscellaneous Highlights: The margin of victory was the largest (by runs) in World Cup history
The Netherlands dropped from seventh to 10th in the table
Others: Australia cemented third place with six points from three wins in five games
The Netherlands is 1-4, its only win coming in a huge upset victory over South Africa last week
